boolean_queries.title_abstract: ((ischemic pain OR chest pain) AND (pectus excavatum OR sunken chest)) AND (intercostal nerve cryoablation OR cryoablation) AND (adolescent OR adult) AND (RCT OR clinical trials OR cohort OR case-control OR observational) AND (thoracic epidural OR paravertebral OR standard care) AND (LOS OR opioid OR pain OR neuropathic) AND (language:EN OR language:PT OR language:ES) AND (year:2000:2024)
